directions: Heat 1/2 cup water in a saucepan over medium-low heat. Add brown sugar and stir until fully dissolved. Add broth powder and stir until completely combined.
Stir in remaining water, 1 tablespoon at a time, stirring constantly until sauce is thick. Simmer, stirring often, until reduced to desired consistency.
title: Homemade Vegan Browning Sauce | Allrecipes
